The Arabs and the Holocaust: The Arab-Israeli War of Narratives

Achcar,Gilbert

Published by Saqi Books, London, 2010

ISBN 10: 0863566391 / ISBN 13: 9780863566394

Used / Hardcover First Edition

Quantity: 1 available

Seller: Richard Thornton Books PBFA, Old Langho, United Kingdom

Seller Rating:

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. This is a Fine Copy of this Hardcover book in a Fine Dust-Jacket which has NO chips or tears to the outer edges of the dust-jacket.Not price clipped and this copy has NO previous names or inscriptions present.This copy was acquired from the private collection of Ursula Owen Co Founder of Virago Press in 1974 and who sat as one of the Judges on the Panel of The Orwell Prize for 2011.The book has a firm binding with no hinge weakness and there is no leaning or rolling to spine.Lovely bright clean copy with crsip white page edges,8vo 358pp First Edition 1st Impression. Seller Inventory # 60411
